lrc.lyric:
[by:不知周]
[ti:And I Love You So]
[ar:Don Mclean]
[al:Favourites In Originals]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Don McLean
[00:01.00] 作词 : Don McLean
[00:11.39]And I love you so
[00:16.92]The people ask me how
[00:21.82]How I've lived till now
[00:26.95]I tell them I don't know
[00:32.08]I guess they understand
[00:36.84]How lonely life has been
[00:42.44]But life began again
[00:47.55]The day you took my hand
[00:54.54]And yes I know
[00:59.25]How lonely life can be
[01:06.30]The shadows follow me
[01:09.70]And the night won't set me free
[01:17.15]But I don't let the evening get me down
[01:26.38]Now that you're around me
[02:09.33]And you love me too
[02:14.24]Your thoughts are just for me
[02:19.93]You set my spirit free
[02:25.05]I'm happy that you do
[02:30.68]The book of life is brief
[02:36.00]And once a page is read
[02:41.81]All but love is dead
[02:47.45]This is my believe
[02:53.90]And yes I know
[02:58.66]How loveless life can be
[03:04.68]The shadows follow me
[03:09.73]And the night won't set me free
[03:17.00]But I don't let the evening get me down
[03:26.07]Now that you're around me
[03:36.60]And I love you so
[03:42.44]The people ask me how
[03:48.59]How I've lived till now
[03:52.82]I tell them
[03:57.43]I don't know
